articles.title: Volunteers breathe polluted air to test impact on brain - BBC
articles.description: Scientists are assessing how exposure to different kinds of air pollution impacts the brain.
articles.content:
In a lab in Manchester, volunteers are donning masks to breathe in lungfuls of polluted air.
They're being exposed to different kinds of fumes, from diesel to cleaning products, in a bid to understa… [+4979 chars]
